title: Canada taps into U.S. military satellites for mobile communications
summary: Canada is the first international partner to access the U.S. Mobile User Objective System (MUOS) satellite network, the U.S. Space Force announced Nov. 30.

title: SpaceX Ready To Test Starlink Direct To Cell Service
summary: In an FCC filing made this week SpaceX is seeking "special temporary authority" to commence testing of there Starlink Direct To Cell service on December 10, with a testing period lasting 180 days.

title: Intelsat To Bring OneWeb Internet To Regional American Airlines Jets
summary: American Airlines has revealed plans to outfit nearly 500 regional jets starting in 2024 with their cutting-edge multi-orbit Wi-Fi connectivity provided by Intelsat.

title: Angola Signs Artemis Accords
summary: Angola officially signed the Artemis Accords on November 30, solidifying its commitment to best practices in space exploration.

title: Angola signs Artemis Accords
summary: Angola signed the U.S.-led Artemis Accords outlining best practices for space exploration Nov. 30, becoming the third African nation to do so.
